name: pandas-datareader
summary: Data readers extracted from the pandas codebase,should be compatible with recent pandas versions

chunks.text:
pandas-datareader

Up to date remote data access for pandas, works for multiple versions of
pandas.

(https://pypi.python.org/pypi/pandas-datareader/)
(https://codecov.io/gh/pydata/pandas-datareader)
(https://pandas-datareader.readthedocs.io/en/latest/)
(https://github.com/psf/black)
(https://pypi.org/project/pandas-datareader/)

Installation

Install using `pip`

Usage

Documentation

[Stable documentation](https://pydata.github.io/pandas-datareader/) is available on
[github.io](https://pydata.github.io/pandas-datareader/). A second copy of the stable
documentation is hosted on [read the docs](https://pandas-datareader.readthedocs.io/)
for more details.

[Development documentation](https://pydata.github.io/pandas-datareader/devel/) is available
for the latest changes in master.

Requirements

Using pandas datareader requires the following packages:

-   pandas>=1.0
-   lxml
-   requests>=2.19.0

Building the documentation additionally requires:

-   matplotlib
-   ipython
-   requests_cache
-   sphinx
-   pydata_sphinx_theme

Development and testing additionally requires:

-   black
-   coverage
-   codecov
-   coveralls
-   flake8
-   pytest
-   pytest-cov
-   wrapt

Install latest development version

or
